Text: The audio files (mp3 ???) do not play!!!

The audio files were not opening initially.In fact my folder showed 0 bytes after downloading.
But I cut and paste the CD1 and CD2 folder into another new folder with another name created somewhere else and behold! the audio files started playing.
Thanks bobok11 for this great upload.
Thanks for the workaround indiaman. I'm on Win7 and everything is ok. Maybe the there is an issue with the length of the folder name. Sorry for that guys.
